mapper.sql: id, manage_id, set_id, tenant_code, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, version, dr
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO manage_set_relation ( id, manage_id, set_id, tenant_code, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, version, dr) VALUES
( #{value.id}, #{value.manageId}, #{value.setId}, #{value.tenantCode}, #{value.createdAt}, #{value.createdBy}, #{value.updatedAt}, #{value.updatedBy}, #{value.version}, #{value.dr})
mapper.update:
INSERT INTO manage_set_relation ( id, manage_id, set_id, tenant_code, created_at, created_by, updated_at, updated_by, version, dr) VALUES
( #{value.id}, #{value.manageId}, #{value.setId}, #{value.tenantCode}, #{value.createdAt}, #{value.createdBy}, #{value.updatedAt}, #{value.updatedBy}, #{value.version}, #{value.dr})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id=values(id), manage_id=values(manage_id), set_id=values(set_id), tenant_code=values(tenant_code), created_at=values(created_at), created_by=values(created_by), updated_at=values(updated_at), updated_by=values(updated_by), version=values(version), dr=values(dr)

UPDATE manage_set_relation set dr=1 where id in
#{id}
